Row.Text: Life is like a box of chocolates.
When fate hands you a lemon, make lemonade.
Fate doesn't want you to be too famous too young.
Kisses are a better fate than wisdom.
The true adventurer goes forth aimless and uncalculating to meet and greet unknown fate.
Fate loves the fearless.
Fate loves the fearless.
Fate pulls you in different directions.
Fate will find a way.
Fate keeps on happening.
Shallow men believe in luck. Strong men believe in cause and effect.
In short, Luck's always to blame.
When it comes to luck, you make your own.
The best luck of all is the luck you make for yourself.
Luck is always the last refuge of laziness and incompetence.
Good luck has its storms.
Luck is great, but most of life is hard work.
Few people realize that luck is created.
One cannot plan for the unexpected.
I'm not a big fan of patterns. I like the unexpected.
All creative people want to do the unexpected.
I like when life is sort of spontaneous.
